You can change your mind and change your consent choices at any time by returning to this site. locations Expand Expand Man Utd Man City What ' s On Things To Do Family  &  Kids Food  &  Drink Comedy Music  &  Nightlife Theatre Shopping Travel Competitions Expand In Your Area Sport Latest Sport Football Manchester City Manchester United Boxing Cricket Basketball Other Sport Fantasy Football Expand Celebs Business Live Property Special Features Home Business Business News Business Allied Filter Systems completes acquisition of Wolf Filtration Chris Thompson, co-owner of Irlam, Salford-based Allied Filter Systems, alongside brother Dan, said the acquisition will allow the business to grow consolidate its position as a market leader in the sector Get the best stories straight to your inbox  through our new personalised digest…  Allied Filter Systems, a manufacturer of liquid filter bags, filter housings and fabricated strainers has completed the acquisition of the business assets of Wolf Filtration for an undisclosed sum with support from Barclays.   Chris Thompson, co-owner of Irlam, Salford-based Allied Filter Systems, alongside brother Dan, said   the acquisition will allow the business to grow consolidate its position as a market leader in the sector   Chris said:  " We would like to thank David Oliver and Steve Walton, the founders of Wolf Filtration, for their assistance during the acquisition process and we look forward to continuing and developing our relationship with the customers and suppliers of Wolf Filtration Limited.   He added:  " The support we continue to receive from Barclays is an endorsement of our strategy and illustrates both the strength of our balance sheet and the quality of our asset base.”   Mike Holligan, relationship director for Barclays Corporate Banking in Manchester, said: “Barclays has enjoyed a strong relationship with the Thompson family for 40 years. Wolf Filtration is an excellent strategic fit and we look forward to seeing Chris and Dan take the business to the next level in the months and years ahead.”
